2024
San Francisco Bay Area
Summary
With a BS in Business Admin/Management Information Systems and
a minor in Graphic Design I bring a unique blend of both technical
and creative skills I will be pursuing a graduate degree in Human
Experience Design Interaction at CSU Long Beach My expertise lies
in creating minimalistic designs that enhance user interactions and
experience 
I am passionate about art technology and crafting simple and user
centric effective solutions In short I thrive on curiosity continuous
learning and the pursuit of becoming a better designer every single
day
Experience
AskClass
User Experience Designer
January 2023  August 2023  8 months
San Jose California United States
 Executed a design sprint with a Product Management Intern resulting in the
creation of POLL feature based on feedback from user interviews 
 Demonstrated the new feature development to CEO anticipating a
remarkable 21% increase in student and professor inclass engagement
 Initiated the creation of a comprehensive design system framework by
documenting and an initial draft for consistency and efficiency
 Streamlining design process by developing reusable components to reduce
design time by 30%
 Effectively redesigned and improved multiple existing features for 20
version enhancing user experience and functionality
Selfemployed
UX Consultant
April 2021  August 2023  2 years 5 months
UXUI Designer | Rondivoo June 2022  August 2022 
  Page 1 of 4

tickets that are integrated into the application testing 
 Contributed to version 20 design revisions to improve user interaction rate by
30%
Lead Designer & Project Manager | Artmoki February 2022  May 2022
 Synthesized design thinking theory into practice using Figma for a team of 5
and improved project proficiency by 80%
 Crafted designs that teammates built upon resulting in a final prototype and
project plan submission using project management principles to the client

9 months

San Jose California United States

students for overall grade improvement

WinnerDivya Harshini Dhavala
UX Designer | MA HXDI @ CSU Long Beach | Open to Internships
2024
San Francisco Bay Area
Summary
With a BS in Business Admin/Management Information Systems and
a minor in Graphic Design, I bring a unique blend of both technical
and creative skills. I will be pursuing a graduate degree in Human
Experience Design Interaction at CSU Long Beach. My expertise lies
in creating minimalistic designs that enhance user interactions and
experience. 
I am passionate about art, technology, and crafting simple and user-
centric effective solutions. In short, I thrive on curiosity, continuous
learning, and the pursuit of becoming a better designer every single
day.
Experience
AskClass
User Experience Designer
January 2023 - August 2023  (8 months)
San Jose, California, United States
• Executed a design sprint with a Product Management Intern, resulting in the
creation of POLL feature based on feedback from user interviews. 
• Demonstrated the new feature development to CEO, anticipating a
remarkable 21% increase in student and professor in-class engagement.
• Initiated the creation of a comprehensive design system framework by
documenting and an initial draft for consistency and efficiency.
• Streamlining design process by developing reusable components to reduce
design time by 30%.
• Effectively re-designed and improved multiple existing features for 2.0
version, enhancing user experience and functionality
Self-employed
UX Consultant
April 2021 - August 2023  (2 years 5 months)
UXUI Designer | Rondivoo, June 2022 - August 2022

tickets that are integrated into the application testing 
• Contributed to version 2.0 design revisions to improve user interaction rate by
30%
Lead Designer & Project Manager | Artmoki, February 2022 - May 2022
• Synthesized design thinking theory into practice using Figma for a team of 5
and improved project proficiency by 80%
• Crafted designs that teammates built upon resulting in a final prototype and
project plan submission using project management principles to the client
